original_text:
When he sees how good is his resting place
    and how pleasant is his land,
he will bend his shoulder to the burden
    and submit to forced labor.
korean_text: 그는 쉴 곳을 보고 좋게 여기며 토지를 보고 아름답게 여기고 어깨를 내려 짐을 메고 압제 아래에서 섬기리로다

sentences.original_text: When he sees how good is his resting place
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 안식처가 얼마나 좋은지 볼 때

sentences.original_text: and how pleasant is his land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 땅이 얼마나 즐거운지 볼 때

sentences.original_text: he will bend his shoulder to the burden
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 짐을 지기 위해 어깨를 굽힐 것입니다
